item.title: Ren add a quote by Anne Rice
item.description: "The prince is never going to come. Everyone knows that; and maybe sleeping beauty's dead." -- Anne Rice

item.title: Ren add a quote by Anne Rice
item.description: "None of us really changes over time. We only become more fully what we are." -- Anne Rice

item.title: Ren add a quote by charles dickens
item.description: "To conceal anything from those to whom I am attached, is not in my nature. I can never close my lips where I have opened my heart." -- charles dickens

item.title: Ren add a quote by Charles Dickens
item.description: "It is a far, far better thing that I do, than I have ever done; it is a far, far better rest that I go to than I have ever known." -- Charles Dickens

item.title: Ren add a quote by Anne Rice
item.description: "when we are weary, we speak lovingly of dreams as if they embodied our true deisres-What we WOULD have when that which we DO have so sorely disappoints us" -- Anne Rice

item.title: Ren add a quote by Anne Rice
item.description: "I have lived lies. I have done it again and again. I live lies because I cannot endure the weakness of anger, and I cannot admit the irrationality of love.-Marius" -- Anne Rice

item.title: Ren add a quote by Anne Rice
item.description: "I saw the Light,saw the myriad spirits flying loose up the Tunnel towards the celestial blaze, the Tunnel perfectly round and widening as they rose and for one blessed moment, one blessed tiny instant, the songs of Heaven resounded down the tunnel as if its curves were not made of wind but of something solid that could echo these ethereal songs, and their organized rhythm, their heartbreaking beauty piercing the catastrophic suffering of this place-Lestat" -- Anne Rice

item.title: Ren add a quote by Gregory Maguire
item.description: "Memory is a part of the present. It builds us up inside; it knits our bones to our muscles and keeps our hearts pumping. It is memory that reminds our bodies to work, and memory that reminds our spirits to work to: it keeps us who we are.~Candle" -- Gregory Maguire

item.title: Ren add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is a strange thing, but when you are dreading something, and would give anything to slow down time, it has a disobliging habit of speeding up." -- J.K. Rowling
